name: Super Admin
description: Full control of the entire system

name: Administrator
description: Manages user accounts and oversees specific functionalities

name: Moderator
description: Oversees forums, comments, or content submissions

name: Customer
description: Uses the application for its services or products

name: Guest
description: Accesses public information with limited interaction

name: Analyst
description: Focuses on data analysis and reporting

name: Auditor
description: Ensures compliance with laws and policies
